definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: Archaeologists have solved an ancient mystery surrounding the famous Easter Island statues.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家發現著名的復活節島巨古石像的祕密。

sentences.english: The park showcased the statues of those martyrs who were killed during the failed uprising.
sentences.chinese: 陵園擺放着那些壯烈犧牲烈士們的石像。

sentences.english: But the wolves stopped again like statues, jaws still opened.
sentences.chinese: 但是狼羣突然變成像石像一樣凝住，仍張大着嘴巴。

sentences.english: The island chiefs had competed to erect ever bigger statues.
sentences.chinese: 復活節島的領主們競相修建更大的石像。

sentences.english: The Queen of Scots was silent. She stood like a stone.
sentences.chinese: 蘇格蘭女王一言不發，像座石像一樣站在那裏。

sentences.english: All around the temples there were statues of dragons that have been morphed with other animals.
sentences.chinese: 在孔廟周圍的是龍演變成其他動物的石像。

sentences.english: The dreaded Gargoyles of Northrend are voracious flying creatures who revel in slaughter and mayhem.
sentences.chinese: 令人畏懼的石像鬼這種貪婪的飛行生物喜愛殺戮。

sentences.english: Giant stone moai stand on Easter Island's stony slopes.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的莫埃石像矗立在復活節島的石坡上。

sentences.english: I did not know the gargoyle .
On 12 class stone stairses, it is each to carve form absolute being fierce very of stone statue.
sentences.chinese: 十二級石階上，每一級都雕塑着一座形神凶煞的石像。

sentences.english: Gargoyles are the best troops to use against enemy shooters and magic-users.
sentences.chinese: 石像鬼是對付遠程兵種的最好部隊。

sentences.english: She planted by the statue a rose-colored weeping willow.
sentences.chinese: 她在這石像旁邊種了一株像玫瑰花那樣紅的垂柳。

sentences.english: The sentinels, facing the banks of the stream, might have been statues to adorn the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 兩名崗哨面向河岸，宛如兩尊裝點在橋頭的石像。

sentences.english: Garrett stands and walks off , snapping the finger off a frozen statue as he does.
sentences.chinese: 加勒特站起並離開，在一個凍結的石像上敲了個響指。

sentences.english: He chiseled the figure of a girl out of a block of white marble.
sentences.chinese: 他把一塊漢白玉雕成一個女孩的石像。

definition: human shape/in human form/of human appearance/doll/puppet
